com.soa.security.spi
Interface ExtensibleSecurityModuleProvider

All Superinterfaces:
ISecurityModuleProvider
public interface ExtensibleSecurityModuleProvider
extends ISecurityModuleProvider

This represents a ISecurityModuleProvider that supports additional security capabilities beyond authentication, authorization and identity browsing.

Method Summary
<T> T
createSecurityProvider(java.lang.Class<T> securityCapability)
          create a security provider with a specific capability.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.soa.security.spi.ISecurityModuleProvider
createAuthorizationAuthority, createIdentitySource, createInteractiveLoginModule, createLoginModule, init, shutdown
 

Method Detail

createSecurityProvider

<T> T createSecurityProvider(java.lang.Class<T> securityCapability)
create a security provider with a specific capability. Return null if the module does not support the specific capability.

Type Parameters:
T - This parameter type represents the security capability
Parameters:
securityCapability - The class represents a specific security capability
Returns:
The security provider that supports the specific security capability.
